name: Tamagotchi no Kira Kira Omisetchi
description:
'Tamagotchi no Kira Kira Omisetchi' (たまごっちのキラキラおみせっち) is a Tamagotchi game developed by NaNaOn-Sha for the Nintendo DS. It was released only in Japan on December 28th, 2008. Being the fifth Tamagotchi entry made for the DS, it is the quadruple sequel to 'Tamagotchi Connection: Corner Shop 3'.

Based on the generational toy line of 'Tamagotchi Connection Version 5 Celebrity', the story takes place in a land known as 'Celebria'; a cornucopia for many Tamagotchi celebrities that roam the isles. Create your avatar, and team up with Mametchi, Memetchi, Kuchipatchi, and Violetchi as you serve the affluent Madame Kiki, who enlists your services to run various shops in Celebria.

Switch between a wide array of 10 unique facilities, from cooking up McDonald's fast food orders, designing your own brand of dresses and jewellery, assigning your team members to set up firework shows, and much, much more! Try to meet all possible 124 Tamagotchi characters, and upgrade each shop to its maximum tier of potential during your stay at Celebria.
